item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog!

This is my first blog post using Hugo and the Lightbi theme. Here’s what I’ve learned:

  1. Hugo is fast.
  2. Markdown makes writing posts easy.
  3. Themes like Lightbi make your site look great.

Subheading Example

You can use Markdown to format your text easily:

  • Bold text: **bold**
  • Italic text: *italic*
  • Links: [Link text](URL)

Here’s some code:
